DESCRIPTION: Merged elevation based on 100 m resolution DEMs from ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2010. No additional post-processing has been applied to remove vegetation and filter noise.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2010
PUBLICATION_TITLE: Danielson, J.J., and Gesch, D.B., 2011, Global multi-resolution terrain elevation data 2010 (GMTED2010): U.S. Geological Survey Open-File Report 2011–1073, 26 p.

DESCRIPTION: Terrain slope based on DEMMRG5 derived in SAGA GIS and expressed in radians x 100.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2011

DESCRIPTION: Profile curvature based on DEMMRG5 derived in SAGA GIS.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2012

ATTRIBUTE_TITLE: Multiresolution Index of Valley Bottom Flatness (MRVBF)
DESCRIPTION: Multiresolution Index of Valley Bottom Flatness (MRVBF) based on DEMMRG5. Derived in SAGA GIS at 500 m, then downscaled to 250 m. Computationally very intensive operation.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2013

DESCRIPTION: Deviation from Mean Value (surface roughness) based on DEMMRG5. Derived in SAGA GIS using a 7 by 7 search radius.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2014

DESCRIPTION: Valley depth based on DEMMRG5 i.e. vertical distance to a channel network base level derived in SAGA GIS.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2015

DESCRIPTION: Negative Topographic Openness based on DEMMRG5; derived in SAGA GIS. Positive topographic openness expresses the dominance of a landscape location. See Yokoyama et al. (2002) for a precise definition.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2016

DESCRIPTION: Positive Topographic Openness based on DEMMRG5; derived in SAGA GIS. Negative topographic openness expresses the enclosure of a landscape location. See Yokoyama et al. (2002) for a precise definition.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2017

DESCRIPTION: SAGA Wetness Index based on DEMMRG5. SAGA TWI is based on a modified catchment area calculation, which does not think of the flow as very thin film. As result it predicts for cells situated in valley floors with a small vertical distance to a channel a more realistic, higher potential soil moisture compared to the standard TWI calculation.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: ViewfinderPanoramas SRTM DEM, SRTMGL3, and GMTED2018

DESCRIPTION: Long-term averaged mean monthly MODIS Enhanced Vegetation Index (EVI) for months January and February. Derived using a stack of MOD13Q1 EVI images.
CITATION_ORIGINATOR: LAND PROCESSES DISTRIBUTED ACTIVE ARCHIVE CENTER

ATTRIBUTE_TITLE: Cultivated land cover for year 2010 based on GlobCover30
